# 1884 Baltimore Monumentals season

| league_place = 3rd
| owners =
| manager = Bill Henderson
|}}
The 1884 Baltimore Monumentals finished with a 58â€“47 record in the Union Association, finishing in fourth place. This was the only season this version of the team existed, and indeed the only season the Union Association existed.
